scratch.name: Scratch
scratch.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft.

ember.name: Ember
ember.description: Deals {damage} Fire damage to one enemy within 15 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Burned.

leer.name: Leer
leer.description: The target’s Defense is reduced by 1.

fake_out.name: Fake Out
fake_out.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft. The target Flinches.
fake_out.notes: Only usable on the user’s first turn in combat.

tackle.name: Tackle
tackle.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft.

confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.description: Deals {damage} Psychic damage to one enemy within 30 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target becomes Confused for 1 + 1d4 turns.

disarming_voice.name: Disarming Voice
disarming_voice.description: Deals {damage} Fairy damage to all enemies in a 15 ft. cone.
disarming_voice.notes: This move does not require an accuracy check.

thunder_fang.name: Thunder Fang
thunder_fang.description: Deals {damage} Electric damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Paralyzed.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.description: Deals {damage} Dark damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a successful hit, roll a Condition Die; on a 10, the target’s Defense is reduced by 1 until the end of its next turn.

ice_shard.name: Ice Shard
ice_shard.description: Deals {damage} Ice damage to one enemy within 5 ft.
ice_shard.notes: Priority: This move is resolved before non-priority actions in the same round.

heavy_slam.name: Heavy Slam
heavy_slam.description: Deals {damage} Steel damage to one enemy within 5 ft.
heavy_slam.notes: If the user is significantly heavier than the target, the GM may increase the damage by one additional die.

smack_down.name: Smack Down
smack_down.description: Deals {damage} Rock damage to one enemy within 5 ft. The target is knocked to the ground until the end of its next turn.
smack_down.notes: A grounded target loses Flying-based movement benefits and is treated as grounded for move interactions.

endure.name: Endure
endure.description: Until the end of this turn, if the user would be reduced to 0 HP, it is instead reduced to 1 HP.
endure.notes: This effect does not prevent additional damage after the turn ends.

feint.name: Feint
feint.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft. This attack bypasses protective effects.
feint.notes: Ignores effects such as Protect, Detect, and similar defensive reactions or shields.

metal_claw.name: Metal Claw
metal_claw.description: Deals {damage} Steel damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the user gains +1 Attack.

counter.name: Counter
counter.description: When the user is hit by a physical attack, it may immediately strike back with 1 known Anchor nest move.
counter.notes: Triggers only after taking damage from a physical attack. Damage type matches the move’s element.

work_up.name: Work Up
work_up.description: The user steels itself, gaining +1 Attack and +1 Special Attack until the end of its next turn.
work_up.notes: Pokemon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

vacuum_wave.name: Vacuum Wave
vacuum_wave.description: Deals {damage} Fighting damage to one enemy within 15 ft.

rock_smash.name: Rock Smash
rock_smash.description: Deals {damage} Fighting damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target’s Defense is reduced by 1 until the end of its next turn.

screech.name: Screech
screech.description: Lets out a piercing screech that sharply lowers the target’s Defense by 2 until the end of its next turn.

quick_guard.name: Quick Guard
quick_guard.description: Until the end of the round, allies within 10 ft. are protected from priority attacks.
quick_guard.notes: Blocks moves with the priority tag. Does not stop non-priority attacks.

force_palm.name: Force Palm
force_palm.description: Deals {damage} Fighting damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Paralyzed.

swords_dance.name: Swords Dance
swords_dance.description: The user performs an intense battle dance, gaining +2 Attack until the end of its next turn.
swords_dance.notes: Pokemon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

helping_hand.name: Helping Hand
helping_hand.description: When an ally within 10 ft. makes an attack, that attack deals one additional damage die.
helping_hand.notes: Declared as a reaction before the ally rolls damage. This move consumes your next available Pokemon Action.

copycat.name: Copycat
copycat.description: The user may use Copycat to repeat a move that was used by another creature during the current round.
copycat.notes: The copied move uses the original move’s targeting, range, and effects. Resource costs and limitations of the copied move still apply at the GM’s discretion.

final_gambit.name: Final Gambit
final_gambit.description: The user sacrifices itself, dealing damage to one enemy equal to the user’s current HP.
final_gambit.notes: After resolving this move, the user is reduced to 0 HP. This damage cannot be reduced by resistance but may be prevented by immunity at the GM’s discretion.

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.description: Deals Fighting damage to one enemy within 5 ft. Damage increases as the user’s HP decreases.
reversal.notes: Use the user’s current HP percentage to determine damage: above 50% HP deal 3 DD; 25–50% HP deal 4 DD; below 25% HP deal 5 DD.

astonish.name: Astonish
astonish.description: Deals {damage} Ghost damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target Flinches.

smog.name: Smog
smog.description: Deals {damage} Poison damage to one enemy within 15 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Poisoned.

minimize.name: Minimize
minimize.description: The user compresses its body, becoming harder to hit and gaining +1 CE

confuse_ray.name: Confuse Ray
confuse_ray.description: Bathes the target in eerie light, causing it to become Confused for 1 + 1d4 turns.

hex.name: Hex
hex.description: Deals {damage} Ghost damage to one enemy within 30 ft. If the target is affected by a status condition, this move deals additional damage.
hex.notes: If the target has any status condition, add +1 damage die.

fire_spin.name: Fire Spin
fire_spin.description: Deals {damage} Fire damage to one enemy within 30 ft. The target is trapped in a vortex of flames.
fire_spin.notes: While trapped, the target is Bound, has its movement reduced to 0, and takes 1 damage die of Fire damage at the start of each of its turns. User may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before the target’s turn begins).

night_shade.name: Night Shade
night_shade.description: Deals Ghost damage to one enemy within 30 ft equal to 4 × the user’s Pokémon level.
night_shade.notes: This damage ignores damage dice and scales strictly with Pokémon level.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description: The user invokes a curse, gaining +1 Attack and +1 Defense but suffering –1 Speed until the end of its next turn.
curse.notes: This is the non-Ghost version of Curse. Ghost-type Pokémon instead use Curse (Ghost).

curse_ghost.name: Curse (Ghost)
curse_ghost.description: The user sacrifices part of its life force to lay a curse on the target.
curse_ghost.notes: The user loses half of its current HP. The target becomes Cursed and takes damage equal to 2 damage die at the end of each of its turns until the curse is removed.

shadow_ball.name: Shadow Ball
shadow_ball.description: Deals {damage} Ghost damage to one enemy within 30 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target’s Special Defense is reduced by 1 until the end of its next turn.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: Deals {damage} Fire damage to one enemy within 30 ft. The target is automatically Burned.
inferno.notes: Burn is guaranteed. No Condition Die roll.

imprison.name: Imprison
imprison.description: Prevents enemies within 15 ft. from using any moves that the user knows.

pain_split.name: Pain Split
pain_split.description: The user and the target split their remaining HP evenly. Both creatures’ HP are set to the average of their current HP values.
pain_split.notes: Does not exceed either creature’s maximum HP. This effect ignores resistances and immunities.

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.description: Deals {damage} Fire damage to one enemy within 30 ft. The user’s Special Attack is reduced by 2 until the end of its next turn.
overheat.notes: Represents extreme energy expenditure. The self-debuff is automatic.

memento.name: Memento
memento.description: The user sacrifices itself, harshly weakening the target’s offensive power.
memento.notes: After resolving this move, the user is reduced to 0 HP. The target suffers –2 Attack and –2 Special Attack until the end of its next turn.

pound.name: Pound
pound.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft.

defense_curl.name: Defense Curl
defense_curl.description: The user curls up defensively, gaining +1 Defense until the end of its next turn. The user may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

sweet_kiss.name: Sweet Kiss
sweet_kiss.description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness, causing it to become Confused for 1 + 1d4 turns.

covet.name: Covet
covet.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft. If the target is holding an item, the user takes it.
covet.notes: Item transfer occurs only if the item can be held and is not otherwise restricted.

charm.name: Charm
charm.description: The user cutely charms the target, sharply reducing its Attack by 2.

tail_whip.name: Tail Whip
tail_whip.description: The user wags its tail, lowering the Defense of nearby enemies.

disable.name: Disable
disable.description: Prevents the target from using its most recently used move.
disable.notes: The disabled move cannot be selected for the duration. If the move is no longer available, the GM determines an appropriate fallback.

spite.name: Spite
spite.description: On a successful hit, the user curses the target with spiteful energy. Choose one: the target loses its Pokémon Action, Trainer Action, or Reaction for the duration.
spite.notes: The user chooses which action type is disabled on hit. This effect may be Focused to extend duration (must be declared before the d4 is rolled).

incinerate.name: Incinerate
incinerate.description: Deals {damage} Fire damage to one enemy within 30 ft. If the target is holding a consumable item, it is destroyed.
incinerate.notes: The GM determines which items qualify as consumable.

will_o_wisp.name: Will-O-Wisp
will_o_wisp.description: Engulfs the target in ghostly flames, User may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

extrasensory.name: Extrasensory
extrasensory.description: Deals {damage} Psychic damage to one enemy within 30 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target Flinches.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.description: Deals {damage} Fire damage to one enemy within 30 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Burned.

safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.description: Allies within 15 ft. are protected from new status conditions for 1 + 1d4 turns. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
safeguard.notes: Prevents new status conditions only; existing statuses are unaffected.

fire_blast.name: Fire Blast
fire_blast.description: Deals {damage} Fire damage to one enemy within 30 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Burned.

powder_snow.name: Powder Snow
powder_snow.description: Deals {damage} Ice damage to all enemies in a 15 ft. cone. On a 10 on the Condition Die, affected targets are Frozen.

icy_wind.name: Icy Wind
icy_wind.description: Deals {damage} Ice damage to all enemies in a 15 ft. cone.

aurora_beam.name: Aurora Beam
aurora_beam.description: Deals {damage} Ice damage to one enemy within 30 ft.

ice_beam.name: Ice Beam
ice_beam.description: Deals {damage} Ice damage to one enemy within 30 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Frozen.

mist.name: Mist
mist.description: A chilling mist envelops allies within 15 ft., preventing their stats from being lowered for 1 + 1d4 turns. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
mist.notes: Prevents enemy-inflicted stat reductions only; self-inflicted stat changes are unaffected.

aurora_veil.name: Aurora Veil
aurora_veil.description: A shimmering veil reduces damage taken by allies within 15 ft. for 1 + 1d4 turns. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
aurora_veil.notes: Reduces incoming damage from both physical and special attacks while active.

freeze_dry.name: Freeze-Dry
freeze_dry.description: Deals {damage} Ice damage to one enemy within 30 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Frozen.
freeze_dry.notes: This move does an extra damage die against water type Pokémon.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: Deals {damage} Ice damage to all enemies in a 30 ft. cone. On a 10 on the Condition Die, affected targets are Frozen.
blizzard.notes: Devastating area attack; the GM may rule environmental effects such as heavy snow or reduced visibility.

round.name: Round
round.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 30 ft.
round.notes: If an ally Pokémon has already used Round this round, you may instead use this move as a Reaction. When used this way, add +1 damage die to this attack, stacking up to a maximum of +3 damage dice total for the round.

bite.name: Bite
bite.description: Deals {damage} Dark damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target Flinches.

yawn.name: Yawn
yawn.description: Makes the target Drowsy. If the target remains Drowsy, it falls Asleep at the start of your next turn.
yawn.notes: Drowsy is applied automatically. Falling Asleep follows the Drowsy condition rules.

snarl.name: Snarl
snarl.description: Deals {damage} Dark damage to all enemies in a 15 ft. cone.

roar.name: Roar
roar.description: Lets out a terrifying roar that forces the target backward.
roar.notes: On hit, the target is pushed 15 ft directly away from the user. If the target’s Trainer is within 15 ft of the target, the Trainer must immediately perform a forced Pokémon swap, following normal switching rules.

hyper_voice.name: Hyper Voice
hyper_voice.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to all enemies in a 30 ft. cone.

growl.name: Growl
growl.description: The user lets out a disarming growl, lowering the Attack of nearby enemies.

peck.name: Peck
peck.description: Deals {damage} Flying damage to one enemy within 5 ft.

fury_attack.name: Fury Attack
fury_attack.description: Deals 1 + 1d4 DD Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft. Multi-hit DD are always d4

dragon_breath.name: Dragon Breath
dragon_breath.description: Deals {damage} Dragon damage to one enemy within 30 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Paralyzed.

sing.name: Sing
sing.description: Choose one enemy within 30 ft. Roll a Condition Die; on a 10, the target falls Asleep.

cotton_guard.name: Cotton Guard
cotton_guard.description: Gain +3 DEF. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

take_down.name: Take Down
take_down.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 15 ft. Recoil: this Pokémon also takes 1 DD damage.

moonblast.name: Moonblast
moonblast.description: Deals {damage} Fairy damage to one enemy within 30 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target’s Special Attack is reduced by 1.

perish_song.name: Perish Song
perish_song.description: All enemies within 30 ft. are afflicted by Perish Song. At the end of a target’s third turn after being afflicted, it drops to 0 HP. Switching out removes this effect. Requires Focus by the user.

quick_attack.name: Quick Attack
quick_attack.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 15 ft. This move has priority.

swift.name: Swift
swift.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to all enemies within range. This move cannot miss.

baton_pass.name: Baton Pass
baton_pass.description: Switch out. When you switch this way, any stat boosts currently on this Pokémon are transferred to the Pokémon that switches in.

double_edge.name: Double-Edge
double_edge.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 15 ft. Recoil: this Pokémon also takes 2 DD damage.

last_resort.name: Last Resort
last_resort.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 30 ft. Can only be used if all known great moves have been used at least once in the battle.

howl.name: Howl
howl.description: You and all allies within 30 ft. gain +1 Attack. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

flame_wheel.name: Flame Wheel
flame_wheel.description: Deals {damage} Fire damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Burned.

agility.name: Agility
agility.description: Increase your Speed by 2. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

fire_fang.name: Fire Fang
fire_fang.description: Deals {damage} Fire damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Burned.

retaliate.name: Retaliate
retaliate.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft. If an ally fainted since the end of your last turn, this move deals +1 DD damage.

play_rough.name: Play Rough
play_rough.description: Deals {damage} Fairy damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target’s Attack is reduced by 1.

flare_blitz.name: Flare Blitz
flare_blitz.description: Deals {damage} Fire damage to one enemy within 5 ft. Recoil: this Pokémon also takes 2 DD damage. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Burned.

rock_slide.name: Rock Slide
rock_slide.description: Deals {damage} Rock damage to all enemies within 30 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, a target is Flinched.

shadow_sneak.name: Shadow Sneak
shadow_sneak.description: Deals {damage} Ghost damage to one enemy within 5 ft. This move has priority.

detect.name: Detect
detect.description: Until the end of the round, the first attack that would hit you instead misses.

phantom_force.name: Phantom Force
phantom_force.description: Choose one enemy within 30 ft. You vanish into the shadows, becoming untargetable until the start of your next turn. At the start of your next turn, you reappear and deal {damage} Ghost damage to that target.

parting_shot.name: Parting Shot
parting_shot.description: Choose one enemy within 30 ft. Reduce the target’s Attack and Special Attack by 1, then switch out.

iron_defense.name: Iron Defense
iron_defense.description: Increase your DEF by 2. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

payback.name: Payback
payback.description: Deals {damage} Dark damage to one enemy within 15 ft. If you moved after the target this round, this move deals +1 DD damage.

dark_pulse.name: Dark Pulse
dark_pulse.description: Deals {damage} Dark damage to one enemy within 60 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Flinched.

ice_fang.name: Ice Fang
ice_fang.description: Deals {damage} Ice damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Frozen.

rock_throw.name: Rock Throw
rock_throw.description: Deals {damage} Rock damage to one enemy within 30 ft.

stomping_tantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum
stomping_tantrum.description: Deals {damage} Ground damage to all creatures within 20 ft. If your last move failed or missed since the end of your last turn, this move deals +1 DD damage.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: Deals {damage} Ground damage to all creatures within 30 ft.
earthquake.notes: This move affects allies as well.

stone_edge.name: Stone Edge
stone_edge.description: Deals {damage} Rock damage to one enemy within 30 ft. This move has an increased critical hit range.

thrash.name: Thrash
thrash.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft. Rampage: after using this move, you must use Thrash again on each of your turns for 1 + 1d4 turns (if able). When the rampage ends, you become Confused.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.description: Whip up a Sandstorm in a 60 ft area within 60 ft. While active, creatures in the area take 1 DD chip damage at the end of their turn (Rock, Ground, and Steel are unaffected).

hyper_beam.name: Hyper Beam
hyper_beam.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 60 ft. Recharge: after using this move, you cannot take an Action on your next turn.

giga_impact.name: Giga Impact
giga_impact.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft. Recharge: after using this move, you cannot take an Action on your next turn.

vine_whip.name: Vine Whip
vine_whip.description: Deals {damage} Grass damage to one enemy within 15 ft.

leech_seed.name: Leech Seed
leech_seed.description: Afflict one enemy within 30 ft. with Leech Seed. At the end of each of the target’s turns, it takes 1 DD damage and you regain HP equal to the damage dealt. Switching out removes this effect.

growth.name: Growth
growth.description: Increase your Attack and Special Attack by 1. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

razor_leaf.name: Razor Leaf
razor_leaf.description: Deals {damage} Grass damage to all enemies within 30 ft. This move has an increased critical hit range.

solar_beam.name: Solar Beam
solar_beam.description: Choose one enemy within 60 ft. You charge solar energy until the start of your next turn. At the start of your next turn, deal {damage} Grass damage to that target.

poison_powder.name: Poison Powder
poison_powder.description: Choose one enemy within 30 ft. Roll a Condition Die; on a 10, the target is Poisoned.

sleep_powder.name: Sleep Powder
sleep_powder.description: Choose one enemy within 30 ft. Roll a Condition Die; on a 10, the target falls Asleep.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.description: Regain HP equal to 2 Healing Dice. If Sunny weather is active, regain 3 Healing Dice instead. If Rain, Sandstorm, or Hail is active, regain 1 Healing Die instead.

worry_seed.name: Worry Seed
worry_seed.description: Replace the target’s Ability with Insomnia.

seed_bomb.name: Seed Bomb
seed_bomb.description: Deals {damage} Grass damage to one enemy within 60 ft.

power_whip.name: Power Whip
power_whip.description: Deals {damage} Grass damage to one enemy within 15 ft.

smokescreen.name: Smokescreen
smokescreen.description: Reduce all enemies’ Accuracy by 1 while within the smokescreen. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

water_gun.name: Water Gun
water_gun.description: Deals {damage} Water damage to one enemy within 30 ft.

withdraw.name: Withdraw
withdraw.description: Increase your DEF by 1. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

rapid_spin.name: Rapid Spin
rapid_spin.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft. Remove all entry hazards affecting your side of the field. Increase your Speed by 1. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

water_pulse.name: Water Pulse
water_pulse.description: Deals {damage} Water damage to one enemy within 30 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target becomes Confused.

protect.name: Protect
protect.description: Until the end of the round, the first attack that would hit you is blocked

rain_dance.name: Rain Dance
rain_dance.description: Create Rain in a 60 ft area within 60 ft. While active, Fire-type moves deal -1 DD damage, and Water-type moves deal +1 DD damage. Focus may be maintained to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

aqua_tail.name: Aqua Tail
aqua_tail.description: Deals {damage} Water damage to one enemy within 5 ft.

shell_smash.name: Shell Smash
shell_smash.description: Increase your Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2, but reduce your DEF and Special DEF by 1. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

hydro_pump.name: Hydro Pump
hydro_pump.description: Deals {damage} Water damage to one enemy within 60 ft.

wave_crash.name: Wave Crash
wave_crash.description: Deals {damage} Water damage to all enemies within 30 ft. You take recoil damage equal to 1 DD.

aqua_jet.name: Aqua Jet
aqua_jet.description: Deals {damage} Water damage to one enemy within 5 ft. This move has priority.

aqua_ring.name: Aqua Ring
aqua_ring.description: Surround yourself with a veil of water. At the end of each of your turns, regain HP equal to 1 DD. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

flail.name: Flail
flail.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft. If your current HP is less than or equal to 25% of your max HP, this move deals +2 DD damage. If your current HP is less than or equal to 50% of your max HP, this move deals +1 DD damage.

life_dew.name: Life Dew
life_dew.description: Regain HP equal to 3 Healing Dice for all allies within 30 ft.

mirror_coat.name: Mirror Coat
mirror_coat.description: As a reaction to being hit by a Special attack, deal damage equal to double the damage taken from that attack to one enemy within 60 ft.

water_spout.name: Water Spout
water_spout.description: Deals {damage} Water damage to one enemy within 30 ft. This move deals +3 DD damage at full HP, +2 at 75% HP, +1 at 50% HP.

slash.name: Slash
slash.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft. This move has an increased critical hit range.

knock_off.name: Knock Off
knock_off.description: Deals {damage} Dark damage to one enemy within 5 ft. If the target is holding an item, it drops the item (the item cannot be used until the end of the battle).

quash.name: Quash
quash.description: Choose one enemy within 30 ft. That target moves last on the next round. This move has priority.

psybeam.name: Psybeam
psybeam.description: Deals {damage} Psychic damage to one enemy within 60 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target becomes Confused.

night_slash.name: Night Slash
night_slash.description: Deals {damage} Dark damage to one enemy within 5 ft. This move has an increased critical hit range.

power_gem.name: Power Gem
power_gem.description: Deals {damage} Rock damage to one enemy within 60 ft.

zen_headbutt.name: Zen Headbutt
zen_headbutt.description: Deals {damage} Psychic damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target flinches and loses its next action.

calm_mind.name: Calm Mind
calm_mind.description: Increase your Special Attack and Special Defense by 1. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

thunder_wave.name: Thunder Wave
thunder_wave.description: Choose one enemy within 30 ft. Roll a Condition Die; on a 10, the target is Paralyzed.

bulk_up.name: Bulk Up
bulk_up.description: Increase your Attack and Defense by 1. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

brick_break.name: Brick Break
brick_break.description: Deals {damage} Fighting damage to one enemy within 5 ft. Remove one defensive buff from the target.

light_screen.name: Light Screen
light_screen.description: Increase the Special Defense of all allies within 30 ft. by 1. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.description: Increase the Defense of all allies within 30 ft. by 1. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

ariel_ace.name: Ariel Ace
ariel_ace.description: Deals {damage} Flying damage to one enemy within 30 ft. This move cannot miss.

thunder_punch.name: Thunder Punch
thunder_punch.description: Deals {damage} Electric damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Paralyzed.

ice_punch.name: Ice Punch
ice_punch.description: Deals {damage} Ice damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Frozen.

energy_ball.name: Energy Ball
energy_ball.description: Deals {damage} Grass damage to one enemy within 30 ft.

dig.name: Dig
dig.description: On your first turn, you burrow underground and cannot be targeted. On your next turn, you may emerge to deal {damage} Ground damage to one enemy within 5 ft.

fire_punch.name: Fire Punch
fire_punch.description: Deals {damage} Fire damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Burned.

body_slam.name: Body Slam
body_slam.description: Deals {damage} Normal damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Paralyzed.

rock_tomb.name: Rock Tomb
rock_tomb.description: Deals {damage} Rock damage to one enemy within 30 ft. The target's Speed is reduced by 1.

giga_drain.name: Giga Drain
giga_drain.description: Deals {damage} Grass damage to one enemy within 30 ft. Heal 1 HD HP.

leaf_blade.name: Leaf Blade
leaf_blade.description: Deals {damage} Grass damage to one enemy within 10 ft. This move has an increased critical hit range.

mud_shot.name: Mud Shot
mud_shot.description: Deals {damage} Ground damage to one enemy within 30 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target's Speed is reduced by 1.

shadow_claw.name: Shadow Claw
shadow_claw.description: Deals {damage} Ghost damage to one enemy within 5 ft. This move has an increased critical hit range.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.description: Deals {damage} Psychic damage to one enemy within 60 ft. Reduce the target's Special Defense by 1.

poison_jab.name: Poison Jab
poison_jab.description: Deals {damage} Poison damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Poisoned.

x-scissor.name: X-Scissor
x-scissor.description: Deals {damage} Bug damage to one enemy within 5 ft.

nasty_plot.name: Nasty Plot
nasty_plot.description: Increase your Special Attack by 2. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.description: Create a substitute that blocks the first attack that would hit you. The substitute has HP equal to 25% of your max HP. If the substitute's HP drops to 0, it is destroyed.

lick.name: Lick
lick.description: Deals {damage} Ghost damage to one enemy within 5 ft. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Paralyzed.

hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
hypnosis.description: Choose one enemy within 30 ft. Roll a Condition Die; on a 10, the target falls Asleep.

haze.name: Haze
haze.description: Remove all stat changes (buffs and debuffs) from all enemies within 30 ft.

dream_eater.name: Dream Eater
dream_eater.description: Deals {damage} Psychic damage to one enemy within 30 ft. Heal 1 HD HP. This move can only be used on targets that are Asleep.
